poi_additional.name: nuclear_explosion_type_space
poi_additional.value: space (altitude over 80 km), rocket or missile

poi_additional.name: nuclear_explosion_salvo_first_detonation
poi_additional.value: first detonation of a salvo test

poi_additional.name: nuclear_explosion_salvo_second_or_later_detonation
poi_additional.value: second or later detonation of a salvo test
